Suppose two players, A and B, are involved in a game. Player A has two strategies: S1 and S2. Player B also has two strategies: S3 and S4. The payoff matrix for this game is as follows:

| | S3 | S4 |
|-|-|-|
| S1 | 2, 2 | 1, 3 |
| S2 | 3, 1 | 0, 0 |

Assume that player A must send a message to player B before playing the game. If player A's message is always truthful, then player B puts equal weights on both messages. However, player A can also choose to send a deceptive message, in which case player B assigns higher weight to the message that is more likely to be truthful.

Suppose player A sends a message that is either truthful or deceptive. What is the probability that player A sends a truthful message given that player B chooses S3 and gets a payoff of 2?
